testcase.name: JWT Utils > isJwtLibraryCall > should detect direct calls
JWT Utils > isJwtLibraryCall > should detect member calls
JWT Utils > isJwtLibraryCall > should return false for non-matching calls
JWT Utils > isJwtLibraryCall > should return false for non-identifier/member callee (line 117)
JWT Utils > isJwtLibraryCall > should return false for member with non-identifier property
JWT Utils > isStringLiteral > should return true for string literals
JWT Utils > isStringLiteral > should return true when value matches
JWT Utils > isStringLiteral > should return false when value does not match
JWT Utils > isStringLiteral > should return false for non-string literals
JWT Utils > extractAlgorithms > should extract single algorithm
JWT Utils > extractAlgorithms > should extract algorithms from array
JWT Utils > extractAlgorithms > should return empty array for no algorithms
JWT Utils > extractAlgorithms > should handle alg key
JWT Utils > extractAlgorithms > should skip SpreadElement properties (line 143)
JWT Utils > extractAlgorithms > should skip properties with non-identifier keys
JWT Utils > hasOption > should return true when option exists
JWT Utils > hasOption > should return false when option missing
JWT Utils > getOptionValue > should return option value
JWT Utils > getOptionValue > should return undefined for missing option
JWT Utils > isWeakSecret > should return true for short secrets
JWT Utils > isWeakSecret > should return false for long secrets
JWT Utils > isWeakSecret > should return false for non-literals
JWT Utils > isEnvVariable > should return true for process.env.X
JWT Utils > isEnvVariable > should return false for other nodes
JWT Utils > operation checkers > isSignOperation detects sign calls
JWT Utils > operation checkers > isVerifyOperation detects verify calls
JWT Utils > operation checkers > isDecodeOperation detects decode calls
JWT Utils > getOptionsArgument > should return options object at default index
JWT Utils > getOptionsArgument > should return undefined if no options
JWT Utils > isTestFile > should return true for test files
JWT Utils > isTestFile > should return false for non-test files
JWT Utils > constants > should have sensitive fields
JWT Utils > constants > should have symmetric algorithms
JWT Utils > constants > should have secure algorithms
JWT Utils > constants > should have insecure algorithms
JWT Utils > constants > should have JWT libraries
